pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert python-poetry(pyproject.toml) to setup.py.It only relies on poetry.core, so the effect is better than any other third-party software.I created this library because python-poetry does not support exporting to setup.py and dephell will generate setup.py incorrectly in some cases.## Install```bashpip install poetry2setup```## UsageRun command `poetry2setup` in your project directory, it will display `setup.py` content in console. If you want to export to `setup.py`, just run `poetry2setup > setup.py`.
